itunes:title: #BlackMarket - Edgewood Pizza with Karlous Millerüçïüçïüçï
description:
Owners of the legendary Black-owned pizza shop "Edgewood Pizza" tell the story of how the Pizza store got started! East Africa stand up! Listen as they give you the inside scoop on how the pizza business runs and how loyalty keep things running. Plus Karlous Miller brings the laughs on this #BlackMarket #BlackExcellence


Join us to celebrate the 1st Anniversary of The Black Effect Podcast Network.
